repairedDockerfile:
FROM ipython/scipystack
MAINTAINER Paco Nathan "http://liber118.com/pxn/"

ADD src/ /tmp
RUN /tmp/install.sh

ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive

RUN apt-get update && \
  apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y libglpk-dev && \
  pip install --no-cache-dir glpk && \
  pip install --no-cache-dir neurolab && \
  pip install --no-cache-dir hyperloglog && \
  pip install --no-cache-dir pybloom && \
  pip install --no-cache-dir git+https://github.com/rafacarrascosa/countminsketch && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y libsm6 libxrender1 libfontconfig1 libXext6 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

EXPOSE 8888

RUN useradd -m -s /bin/bash atlas

RUN mkdir -p /home/atlas
ADD notebook/ /home/atlas
WORKDIR /home/atlas
RUN chown -R atlas:atlas /home/atlas

USER atlas
ENV HOME /home/atlas
ENV SHELL /bin/bash
ENV USER atlas

RUN find . -name '*.ipynb' -exec ipython trust {} \;
